target.name: help
target.echo:
Build targets: ############################ PARAMETERS #################################
-Denv= - set environment. Default value is "dev".
############################ TASKS ######################################
build.db - builds database (drop, create, load fixtures) for given environment.
cc - clears cache, dump assets for dev and prod environment.
phpunit - executes phpunit tests with code coverage report. Result is saved into test_result directory.
